mapper.insert: insert into bmember(id, pw, name, store, zipcode, num, storeAddr) values (#{bid}, #{bpw}, #{name}, #{store}, #{zipcode}, #{num}, #{storeAddr})
insert into cmember(id, pw, name, ph, zipcode, address, cardnumber, bank, expirationdate) values (#{cid}, #{cpw}, #{name}, #{ph}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{cardnumber}, #{bank}, #{expirationdate})
